text: I read a short bio, sounds like an interesting mix of interest and experience. So you're pretty up to date with software skills I imagine. So are you considering between compositing and production at the moment then?

Hi Pedram, 
I am want to go into vfx production now so am making up my CV for it and learning the softwares, but am open to the right compositing role just to get into the industry again.
I have been learning fine arts painting to help me with the compositing skills. I didnâ€™t manage to make a showreel though for Nuke although I have my old one in Shake.
